privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: FlashCut.ai is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide when creating an account (name, email) and service usage data (activity logs, device info). We do not collect your video data or creative content.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain login sessions and analytics cookies to improve the experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use Google OAuth for authentication. When you sign in with Google, we only receive your name and email from Google, no other data is accessed.

security.title: Security
security.content: Passwords are encrypted using bcrypt. Data is transmitted over HTTPS. We regularly update our security measures.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. Contact support@flashcut.ai to make a request.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy. Any significant changes will be communicated via email or on the website.

license.title: License

restrictions.title: Restrictions

payment.title: Payment
